item.description:
It's super early - but I know there are other early bird hikers out there...

For those who are addicted to hiking and need a mid-week fix, join me for an invigorating early morning hike in the Fells. A friend of mine once said that the Fells look, feel and sound different in the early morning hours - once you experience it, you'll be hooked.  He's right!

What's the plan?

We'll do an approx. 5 mile loop around the North and Middle Reservoirs - partially on fire roads and partially on the Skyline trail. While the terrain is not nearly as challenging as the Whites, there are a few steep ascents to rocky outcrops and we'll get a bit of elevation (perhaps 700 feet or so?). We also plan to hike at a relatively fast pace - 3+mph - and hope to finish in about 1 hour 45 min. You don't need to be an experienced hiker to join, but you should have some reasonable level of aerobic fitness.  So you know what to expect - we're out to get exercise, not take a leisurely, relaxed stroll in the woods. 

Where will we meet?

We're meeting  NEAR the Long Pond Parking (gate 13) on South Border Rd since the gates are likely still locked/closed at that hour. We'll park at the pull-off just south of the Long Pond Parking lot. The approximate address (use your GPS) is 456 South Border Road, Winchester, MA.  Heading north on South Border Rd (from Exit 33 on I-93), you'll go about 1.5 miles. You'll pass Leslie Rd on your left shortly before the pull off (on your right). If you get to the gated Long Pond Parking (on your right) you've gone too far. Please be on time - most of us have to get to work eventually and if we start late, we'll finish late and mess up our schedules. I'll leave the lot promptly at 5:35am. 

What should I bring?

Water (24 oz - 1 Liter), good hiking shoes/trail runners, bug spray

More Info:

Rain will cancel - I'll send out an email (with my cell phone number) to confirmed participants the night before the hike to confirm details.

You can find out more information about the Fells here: http://www.fells.org/visit/

And you can print out free maps here: http://www.fellsbiker.com/maps

Map view of parking area:   Parking
item.how_to_find_us: Silver Subaru Outback (in the parking area just SOUTH of the gated Long Pond Parking Lot)
item.name: Early Morning Hike at Middlesex Fells
